entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use CancellationToken with HttpClient #106558
    Future
  • Test failure: "Internal consistency check failed" in System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DSASignVerify_Stream.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #106556
  • ILLink doesn't warn for annotation mismatch for derived method implementing a recursive interface #106552
    Future
  • JIT: Debug/Release diff on ARM32 #106551
  • JIT: Debug/Release diff for `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogicalNarrowingLower` #106546
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' #106545
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->AsMultiOp()->GetOperandCount() == 2' during 'Assertion prop' #106544
    10.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback GC related behavior changed in CoreCLR 8.0? #106543
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Should omit `.Reshape` function. #106539
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Non-monotonic constructor errors #106538
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Inconsistent TryFlattenTo & TryBroadcastTo vs TryCopyTo #106537
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Incorrect IndexOutOfRangeException on empty slice #106536
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors SetSlice safety #106535
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors constructor safety #106534
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ToString(...)` overloads for `Array`, `Array<T>`, `Memory<T>`, `Span<T>` for pretty printing underlying contents/elements and maybe a new general `System.Print(...)`/`System.PrettyPrint(...)` #106531
    Future
  • Expression.Property() throws System.ArgumentException: 'The method 'X' is not a property accessor (Parameter 'propertyAccessor')' #106530
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly methods crash at runtime without relink #106529
    10.0.0
  • Android - With set Turkish locale "i".ToUpper() is giving 'I" instead of 'İ' #106560
  • [API Proposal]: Expose MemoryStream.InternalReadSpan() as a public method #106524
    Future
  • wasi interop failed to work after .net 9 preview 7 release #106523
    10.0.0
  • Httpwebrequest Cause program crash in runtime 8.0.5,Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter #106522
  • windows-arm64 release CrossAOT_Mono crossaot builds failing on Windows headers #106521
    9.0.0

Closed

  • .NET 9 Preview 7 - LLVM-related build failure #105516
    9.0.0
  • AV in runtime when catching exception thrown in other ALC with new EH on win-arm64 #105483
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `gtCostsInitialized` during `Determine first cold block` #106484
    10.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve Test: Inputs for LoadVector API test #101475
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_b2->IsLast()' during 'Optimize bools' #106487
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #84911
    9.0.0
  • Occasionally hitting error MSB6006: "csc.dll" exited with code 139 on linux (w/ GCDynamicAdaptationMode=1) #104123
    9.0.0
  • Internal Package vulnerabilities referenced #106528
  • Support equivalent of IQueryable<ComposablePartDefinition> Parts in System.Composition #24763
  • Move to zlib-ng for better CPU intrinsics support (ARM64 performance) #87560
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'ins != INS_invalid' during 'Generate code' #106478
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator doesn't support IEnumerable types with same functionality as reflection based binder #96652
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix KMAC tests on Azure Linux #106565
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenerateResolveStub #106562
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adjust the vector docs to use langword instead of cref to preserve generic type information where relevant #106561
    area-System.Numerics
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix unused operand marking in LowerHWIntrinsicTernaryLogic #106555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetTargetPath hook point #106553
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix TreatWarningsAsErrors for linux #106549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump downlevel to 8.0.8 #106548
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Skip static constructors in DynamicallyAccessedMembersBinder #106541
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add JIT Helpers for RISCV64 #106540
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ignore SYSLIB0057 obsoletion in wasm websocket tests #106527
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Share implementation of GenerateGuidFromName with EventSourceGenerator.Parser and CoreLib #106519
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try re-enabling some CoreCLR/NativeAOT tests #106514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0-rc1] Fallback to treating as object if not collection #106517
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Revert "[browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger" #106426
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Disable MD5 tests on Azure Linux #106554
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fixed creating generic type with abstract type when it is has a default constractor constrant #101963
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update debugging-runtime.md #106518
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc/1] Downlevel 8.0.9 #106547
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #106550
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix Enum field type bug found when underlying type is set from assembly loaded with MLC #106513
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [GC] Allow distribute_free_regions to decommit and redistribute #106414
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assert in bool optimizer #106542
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update packaging.targets #106490
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-rc1] JIT: update simd base type when combining simd nodes for bitwise ops #106520
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay #106466
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update `MethodTable::IsDynamicStatics` and `DacpMethodTableData::bIsDynamic` to return 0/1 instead of flag value #106504
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't try to do hot/cold splitting unless optimizing #106515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove implicit fallthrough assert in bool optimizer #106492
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve Test: test randomized masks for LoadVector APIs (#101475) #106449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `HelperMethodFrame`s from `Object` methods #106497
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Replace TlsStream type by using SslStream directly #106451
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix stack overflow handling with SuperPMI #106495
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [apple-mobile] Disable TLSWitLoadedDlls for Apple mobile due to missing native libs #106461
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Remove RefOnly optional msbuild switch #106482
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [cdac] Fix getting free object size in GetObjectData #106505
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: update simd base type when combining simd nodes for bitwise ops #106510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fallback to treating as object if not collection #106378
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Updated

  • Add Base64Url fuzzer #106509
    area-System.Buffers
  • Track generic instantiations in ILLink #106370
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow in the configuration source gen #106511
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Remove managed interfaces impls defined in CoreCLR #105965
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer: add warnings for DAM on type #105994
    area-Meta
  • [NO MERGE] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Issue #105820 #106440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Make GetPropertyCount public and fix its return value #106503
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Basic ISOSDacInterface::GetMethodDescData #106413
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2517422 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106498
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106506
    area-System.Runtime
  • [Tar] Fill in the file size even if the file is empty. #106409
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass structs containing empty struct arrays according to integer calling convention #106266
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • GC cleanup #105517
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [feature/9.0-cdac-backports] Data descriptor changes for GetMethodDescName #106463
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Disallow types with property names conflicting with metadata. #106460
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Use ProjectReferences in libs #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] Fix getting array function type in RuntimeTypeSystem.IsArrayMethod #106512
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Add helper methods to Target for reading UTF-8/16 strings #106483
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
